meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7179.

td.p: Rob Russell, a tutoring and testing director from Johnson City, Tennessee
Marie Halvorsen-Ganepola, a professor from Granger, Indiana
Ricky Hudson, a physical therapist from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,199)

tr.td: PUZZLERS
NORTH & SOUTH
POLITICS, FOR SHORT
A LITTLE READING
MEASURING WHAT?
I'M IN LOVE WITH THAT SONG

the left brain

Rob
Triple Stumper
')
